title: Tim Cook delivers commencement address at Gallaudet University, highlights accessibility
content:
Apple CEO Tim Cook delivered his commencement speech today in Washington, DC, at Gallaudet University. Gallaudet is a university for the deaf and hard of hearing and partners with Apple to create inclusive products.

moreâ€¦

The post Tim Cook delivers commencement address at Gallaudet University, highlights accessibility appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple CEO Tim Cook delivered his commencement speech today, May 13, in Washington, DC at Gallaudet University.
